content: {"version":2,"machineId":"8cb0bf32-360b-472e-9a57-f7b1255801a3","content":"{\"windows\":\"// 将键绑定放在此文件中以覆盖默认值auto[]\\n[\\n  {\\n    \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+y\\\",\\n    \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.emmet.action.evaluateMathExpression\\\"\\n    //解析表达式  4+4  8\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+k\\\",\\n    \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.terminal.clear\\\",\\n    \\\"when\\\": \\\"terminalFocus\\\"\\n    //清除终端的输入内容\\n  }\\n]\",\"mac\":\"// Empty\"}"}
